com.pfa

Class DisparityError

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pfa.DisparityError

  • public class DisparityError
extends java.lang.Object
    Determine the error of the computed disparity using various compariason methods.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) double absAverageError
      same as averageError, but with absolute values
      (package private) double averageError
      average difference between trueDisparity and computedDisparity value
      (package private) double avgBlocksError
      error calculated with disparityErrorByBlock method
      (package private) double errorIfConstMult
      error considering the case where trueDisparity values = computedDisparity * k, k constant
      (package private) double errorIfConstSum
      error considering the case where trueDisparity values = computedDisparity + k, k constant

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DisparityError(Mat trueDisparity, Mat computedDisparity)
      calculate potential errors in the disparity map established

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void disparityErrorByBlock(Mat trueDisparity, Mat computedDisparity, int rows, int cols)
      another method to calculate potential errors in the disparity map established cut the disparity maps in blocs and calculate the difference between the average values of each block

    • Constructor Detail

      • DisparityError

        public DisparityError(Mat trueDisparity,
                      Mat computedDisparity)
        calculate potential errors in the disparity map established
        Parameters:
        trueDisparity - the true disparity matrix from the dataset
        computedDisparity - the disparity matrix computed from the left image from the dataset

    • Method Detail

      • disparityErrorByBlock

        private void disparityErrorByBlock(Mat trueDisparity,
                                   Mat computedDisparity,
                                   int rows,
                                   int cols)
        another method to calculate potential errors in the disparity map established cut the disparity maps in blocs and calculate the difference between the average values of each block
        Parameters:
        trueDisparity - the true disparity matrix from the dataset
        computedDisparity - the disparity matrix computed from the left image from the dataset
